author: Fjalar Goud
description: Bittersweet, with the richness of Grand Marnier balancing the bitter liqueur and lemon juice. (I'm guilty of rebalancing this cocktail and adding the prosecco.)
name: King of Orange
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
